text: I really like the staff at the Mod Pizza, they are very nice and helpful.  The crust is just a little thin for my preference.  I will try a salad next time.  I will be back.

text: This place is fantastic. Super friendly and awesome staff (tonight Nico went above and beyond). They also have such delicious pizza super fresh with so many toppings.

text: Good place to eat. The guy at the ovens making the pies made the experience great and his customer service skills are the best I've seen. Definitely will eat here again .

text: I love MOD pizza. The food is very good. You can customize everything. The best part is the customer experience. You can tell they care about having a welcoming environment and positive team culture.

text: If you like MOD Pizza this is a good one to visit.  The staff is welcoming and helpful if you don't know exactly what you want.  Try them at least once if you have never done so before.
